name: 莊承義
objective:
This course will discuss the timing analysis of high-speed digital signals and their impact on the timing budget from the perspective of digital system design.
There are five topics:
1. Fundamentals
2. Crosstalk effects of the coupled transmission line
3. Non-ideal interconnect issues
4. Packages, connectors, and vias
5. Differential Signaling
